title: Episode 960 - Special Guest Louisville Officer Dexter Pitts
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Louisville police officer Dexter Pitts joins the show to talk about serving as a black cop during the Black Lives Matters protests and riots, how Defund the Police has hurt American policing and caused an increase in black murders, his time serving in Ir...
itunes:summary:
Louisville police officer Dexter Pitts joins the show to talk about serving as a black cop during the Black Lives Matters protests and riots, how Defund the Police has hurt American policing and caused an increase in black murders, his time serving in Iraq, and working as a Border Patrol agent.
